duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute sales strategies to acquire new business and build a book of residual income.
Prioritize opportunities and manage multiple touch points to drive sales outcomes.
Engage in face-to-face meetings, networking, and building a strong portfolio of clients.
Maintain client relationships for future revenue growth and renewals.
Bring concepts to life and communicate persuasively to drive sales and maintain a top position in sales leaderboard.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
